魲魲魲

魲字的基本解释

魲
lú
古同“鲈”。

魲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lú］
［《廣韻》落胡切，平模，來。］
亦作“魲1”。“鲈1”的繁体字。
(1)松江鲈鱼。杜父鱼科。鳃膜上各有两条橙黄色的斜纹，古人误为四鳃，故又称“四鳃鱸”。鳞退化，体呈黄褐色。生活在近岸浅海，夏秋进入淡水河川后，肉更肥美，尤以松江所产最为名贵。
(2)鮨科鲈鱼。体侧扁，巨口細鳞，背部灰绿色，腹面白色，身体两侧和背鳍有黑斑。夏季进入淡水，冬季返回海中。我国沿岸浅海均产。

魲字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　魲； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1466第32
【篇海】音蘆。魚名。【正字通】俗鱸字，與馬部驢作馿同。

魲字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
魲字的起名意思

暂无。

魲
Basic explanation of words
魲
lú
Gu Tong "perch".
魲
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [lú]
["Guangyun" Luo Huqie, flat model, come. ]
Also known as "魲1". The traditional characters of "Ling 1".
(1) Songjiang perch. Du Fu fish family. There are two orange-yellow diagonal stripes on each gill membrane, which was mistaken for four gills by ancients, so it is also called "four gill perch". The scales are degraded and the body is yellowish brown. Living in the shallow sea near the coast, after entering the freshwater rivers in summer and autumn, the meat is more plump, especially from Songjiang.
(2) Serranidae perch. The side of the body is flat, with a large mouth and fine scales, the back is gray-green, the ventral surface is white, and there are dark spots on both sides of the body and dorsal fin. It enters fresh water in summer and returns to the sea in winter. It is produced in shallow waters along the coast of my country.
魲
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　魲; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1466 32
[Pianhai] Yinlu. The name of the fish. [Zhengzitong] The vulgar character for perch, which is the same as Mabu donkey.
魲
